auth.title: Authentication
auth.intro: Add your username and secret here to allow access to the API.
auth.confirmlogouttext: Are you sure you want to log out?  You will lose all your cached data and won't be able to access some reports until you log back in again.

secret.label: Secret
secret.minlength: The secret value should be 32 characters in length.

preferences.title: Preferences
preferences.intro: You can change your preferences here, and make using the tool easier each time you come back.

storage.title: Manage Storage
storage.intro: You can view what the application currently stores about your requests and credentials here, and clear them if you need.  'Logout' effectively clears everyting also!

clearall.title: Clear Everything!
clearall.description: You can clear everything now, this includes the credentials you are currently authentication against, so make sure you still have them!
clearall.confirmtitle: Are you sure you want to delete all the cache?
clearall.confirmdescription: If you delete everything you will also lose the credentials you are currently logged in with.  We ___really___ want to double check that you want to clear it all.  Click 'Confirm' to delete everything.  This is not undo-able.

clearcache.confirmdescription: Are you sure you want to delete this indivdual cache?

list.title: All your caches belong to me
list.description: Below is a list of all the current caches held by the application, you can choose to clear each one individually.
list.warning: Cache's listed below are all that have been accessed so far, there may be others that haven't been accessed yet.
